translation.en: Puppet, sir? Only 10 piastres .
translation.ja: これ買って　10ピアストルだ

translation.en: They're crap. They fall apart before you're out the door.
translation.ja: そんな人形 すぐ壊れてしまう

translation.en: Five then, sir. It's handmade!
Please? My sister. She's very, very sick.
translation.ja: お願いだよ 妹が病気で苦しんでるんだ

translation.en: I know your sister. She's peddling in the next bar over.
translation.ja: 隣の酒場で物売りしてたぞ

translation.en: Do you know my mother?
Nope. She's very, very sick.
translation.ja: 一度も 重い病気だ

translation.en: I'll give you two.
That's a bad idea, you know.
Like feeding pigeons.
Do I know you? My name is Semelier.
translation.ja: だれだね？ セメリエです

translation.en: I work for a private collector of rare antiquities. I cabled you last week.
translation.ja: 収集家の秘書で 先週 電報を打った

translation.en: Yes. And I didn't answer.
translation.ja: そうだったな 返事はしてない

translation.en: There's been a discovery in East Africa.
A Christian church, circa 5 A.D.
No, that's not possible.
The Byzantine Empire had adopted Christianity at that time, but they never got that far south.
translation.ja: 当時キリスト教は そこまで広まってない

translation.en: Nevertheless, there it sits.
The British have financed a dig to uncover this church.
translation.ja: イギリスが発掘を始めた

translation.en: We believe a rare object waits inside.
We'd like you to find it and bring it back to us.
translation.ja: 持ち帰ってきてほしい

translation.en: So you think I'm a thief?
Now you think I'm a thief and a whore.
No...
simply a man who's lost faith in everything except himself.
translation.ja: 自分しか信じられない人間だ

translation.en: You know nothing about me.
An Oxford-educated archeologist, an expert in religious icons.
translation.ja: 一流の考古学者で 聖像(イコン)の専門家

translation.en: You were a priest before the war. So, what happened?
translation.ja: 戦前は神父だった 辞めた訳は？

translation.en: This is a leather impression of the artifact we're looking for.
translation.ja: こんな顔の彫像を捜してる

translation.en: A representation of a mythical demon.
translation.ja: 神話にある悪魔の彫像だ

translation.en: It's Sumerian.
What makes you think it's in a church in Africa?
Major Granville in Nairobi is in charge of the dig.
translation.ja: 発掘を担当中の少佐に

translation.en: He's been persuaded to let you join it.
translation.ja: 君の参加を許可させた

translation.en: You're assuming that I will say yes.
You already have.
MAN: March!
translation.ja: 心で言ってる イギリス軍司令部 ケニア　ナイロビ

translation.en: Left, left, right, left. Left....
translation.ja: イギリス軍司令部 ケニア　ナイロビ

translation.en: Mr. Merrin, sir. The major will see you now.
translation.ja: メリン様　少佐の所へ

translation.en: GRANVILLE: Beautiful, aren't they?
It's a hobby from school days. Works wonders for the nerves.
translation.ja: 昔からの趣味だ 気持ちがなごむ

translation.en: You should try it sometime.
What can you tell me about the dig?
The location is a remote area of the Turkana district called Derati.
translation.ja: 場所はトゥルカナ地方の デラーティという所だ

translation.en: It was discovered several months ago by a detachment of my men on maneuvers there.
translation.ja: 数ヵ月前に 私の部隊が発見した

translation.en: When the powers that be realized its importance, they organized a dig.
translation.ja: 政府が重要性に気づき 発掘を命じたんだ

translation.en: So, what have they learned so far?
That it's a church where no church should be.
This is Father Francis. He'll be accompanying you to Derati.
translation.ja: フランシス神父だ デラーティまで一緒に行く

translation.en: It's a pleasure to finally meet you, Father Merrin. I've read all your work at seminary.
translation.ja: メリン神父 神学校で著書を読みました

translation.en: It's Mr. Merrin.
I was especially impressed with your treatise on the Roman rituals.
translation.ja: 儀式を論じた著書は力作だ

translation.en: I'm no longer a part of that.
But I'm sure you didn't come here to discuss Catholic rituals.
translation.ja: 君は儀式を論じにここへ？

translation.en: No, I was actually headed to Kenya to begin missionary work when Rome learned of the discovery.
translation.ja: 布教しに来た時 教会が見つかったので⸺

translation.en: They asked me to make sure the site's religious aspect have the proper consideration.
translation.ja: “汚(けが)されないよう見守れ”と 教皇庁が

translation.en: How come you've opened the site to the Vatican?
translation.ja: 教皇庁から発掘の許可は？

translation.en: We haven't... officially.
translation.ja: 得ていない　公式にはな

translation.en: You're both my guests.
Tell me, have you any theories on who might have built this church?
translation.ja: だれが建てた教会か見当は？

translation.en: Well, not until I've seen it. Surely the Vatican has some record of its creation?
translation.ja: 見てみないと 教皇庁に記録があるはずだ

translation.en: No, I'm afraid not.
We're as in the dark about it as you are.
How long have you been with the dig, Chuma?
Since the beginning. The British hired me as an interpreter.
translation.ja: 最初から 通訳として雇われてね

translation.en: What happened here?
Plague. Ravaged the valley 50 years ago.
translation.ja: 疫病の死者 50年前に流行した

translation.en: How many died?
All of them.
I'm Lankester Merrin. Major Granville should've contacted you about my joining the dig.
translation.ja: ランカスター･メリンだ 少佐から話は聞いたろ

translation.en: He did.
Is something bothering you, mate?
No. I'd like to see the dig site as soon as possible.
translation.ja: いや 発掘現場を見たい

translation.en: Do you drink, Merrin? I shouldn't.
But my will is weak.
Then you might just survive this place.
translation.ja: 飲まずにいられん現場さ

translation.en: I understand you've uncovered the church dome, but that progress has slowed down.
translation.ja: つまり発掘が 順調じゃないんだな？

translation.en: You could say that. Right, doctor?
translation.ja: そうさ　なあ 先生

translation.en: I'm Sarah Novak. Very nice to meet you.
Lankester-- Lankester Merrin.
You still haven't made it by my room, doctor.
I've been having this swelling... in the evening.
translation.ja: うずいて大変なんだ 夜になるといつもな

translation.en: Thought you might have something I could put on it.
How about a muzzle?
So how are the interior excavations coming on?
translation.ja: 教会の中の発掘調査は？

translation.en: They're not. No?
translation.ja: 少しも 遺跡が崩れ落ちたのか？

translation.en: Has the structure collapsed?
translation.ja: 遺跡が崩れ落ちたのか？

translation.en: No, the church is perfect, but none of the men will enter.
translation.ja: しっかりしてるが だれも中に入らん

translation.en: Those we have left, anyway. Why is that?
translation.ja: 皆 逃げちまう どうして

translation.en: I shall be leaving for the dig in five minutes.
Pleasant fellow. What's wrong with his face?
translation.ja: 妙な男だ 顔の変な出来物は？

translation.en: Other than that it's attached to his body?
Could be an allergic reaction or some kind of localized infection.
translation.ja: この地方だけの感染症かも

translation.en: Do you know why the men won't enter the church?
translation.ja: なぜ皆 逃げるんだ？

translation.en: Evil spirits... Oh. if you believe the Turkana.
translation.ja: 悪霊よ 地元の人は いると信じてる

translation.en: And do you?
No. I'm a doctor.
As a priest, surely you must believe in such things.
translation.ja: 神父なら信じるでしょ？

translation.en: I'm an archeologist. I'm not a priest.
Now, that's funny.
I met Father Francis outside, and he told me you were.
translation.ja: フランシス神父の話と違う

translation.en: Did he? Well, he is mistaken.
translation.ja: あの神父が間違えたんです

translation.en: FRANCIS: Father Merrin.
This is Emekwi. He's donating the use of a room in his hotel for the mission school.
translation.ja: エメクイです 彼のホテルを学校代わりに

translation.en: Father, we are so glad that you are here.
translation.ja: 神父様　よく来て下さった

translation.en: These are my sons, James and Joseph.
translation.ja: 息子の ジェームスとジョセフ

translation.en: Hello, James. Joseph. They are learning the Bible. We are Christians, you know.
translation.ja: 聖書を学んでます 私たちはキリスト教徒だ

translation.en: Emekwi, can you see to Mr. Merrin's bags?
Of course. James, Joseph?
Very nice meeting you, doctor.
There's your goddamn church.
MERRIN: Is this your first assignment, Father?
FRANCIS: Uh well, before this, I was studying in the archives in the Holy See.
translation.ja: 来る前は教皇庁の文書館に

translation.en: The Vatican. Impressive. But not really training for missionary work, is it?
translation.ja: バチカンにいたのか 布教の勉強にはならんな

translation.en: This is strange.
It's 1500 years old. It should be badly weathered.
translation.ja: 1500年もたってるのに 風化してないぞ

translation.en: It's almost as if it were buried right after it was built.
translation.ja: 建ててすぐ埋めたみたいだ

translation.en: Chuma.
Where's Jefferies? I need to go into the church.
translation.ja: ジェフリースはどこだ？

translation.en: Hyenas.
They've been here ever since we started digging.
Even at daytime?
What's the matter with him? I don't know.
The heat?
Joseph?
Are you out here by yourself? It's dangerous.
translation.ja: １人なのか？ ここは危ないぞ

translation.en: I'm collecting rocks. I can see that.
translation.ja: 岩を集めてる 学者さんか

translation.en: I think you're about ready for this now.
translation.ja: なら これを使うといい

translation.en: It's a tool for professional diggers.
His seizure stopped. I wanted to keep him at the hospital for observation,
translation.ja: 診療所で 容体を診たかったけど⸺

translation.en: but Turkana have stopped trusting my medicine.
translation.ja: 西洋医学を拒んでるの

translation.en: Well, that must make your job very hard.
You have no idea.
Thank you.
What is it you hope to find here?
The answer to why a church was built here a thousand years before Christianity arrived.
translation.ja: キリスト教が伝わる前に なぜ建てたのか

translation.en: You were a priest once, weren't you?
Yes, I was.
Bloody savages!
Can't wipe their own ass without instruction.
I have to get back to town. Wait. I found this.
translation.ja: 帰るわ 待ってくれ こいつを見つけたんだ

translation.en: And I want you to have it.
It's a St. Joseph, for luck.
translation.ja: 聖ヨセフのお守りだぞ

translation.en: Please. For my behavior.
translation.ja: バカを言ったおわびだ

translation.en: Thank you.
What the hell are you doing? Get the fuck out of here, you little scab!
translation.ja: 何をしてる こいつ うせやがれ

translation.en: Don't!
Joseph, wait.
Don't do that.
All right, Merrin. I didn't know you was a fuzzy lover.
translation.ja: アフリカ人の味方とはな

translation.en: SARAH: It's okay. Come.
These little buggers get in everywhere.
How soon can you have the doors to the church uncovered?
A few days.
And in the meantime, how do we get in?
"We" don't. Chuma will take you in through the roof.
translation.ja: 俺は入らんが チューマが屋根から

translation.en: Following us, Father?
Is it safe to walk around?
Let's see.
Lucifer. The Lord's favorite angel.
translation.ja: ルシファー　元は天使だった

translation.en: MERRIN: Cast out after the war in heaven. Can't even trust angels, can you?
translation.ja: 天から追われて悪魔に 天使も信用できんな

translation.en: You ever seen anything like it?
Not this far from Rome.
It's odd.
Churches were built to exalt heaven, but this...
translation.ja: 教会は神を たたえる場なのに⸺

translation.en: The weapons are pointing downward.
Look behind you, Father.
Desecration of Christ.
translation.ja: 神への冒涜(ぼうとく)だ

translation.en: Who would do something like this?
The crucifix was broken off from here.
Chuma, is there an inventory of what's been found here?
translation.ja: 発掘された物の目録は？

translation.en: I wouldn't know. MERRIN: Who would know?
translation.ja: さあ ここには もう人が入ってる

translation.en: Because this place has been vandalized.
translation.ja: ここには もう人が入ってる

translation.en: Probably the lead archeologist, Monsieur Bession.
translation.ja: 学者のベシオンさんだと思う

translation.en: So where can I find him? I need to talk to him.
translation.ja: 今どこにいる　話を聞きたい

translation.en: It's not possible.
He's gone mad.
No one's been inside Bession's tent since he fell ill?
translation.ja: 病んでから だれも中へ？

translation.en: They are superstitious.
And you?
Not superstitious. Smart.
translation.ja: 気にしない　理性派だ

translation.en: Chuma!
Yes?
Where's Bession now?
A sanatorium in Nairobi.
How long has he been gone?
A few weeks.
And he can read and write Aramaic?
Sorry?
The language spoken in Palestine at the time of Christ.
translation.ja: キリストたちの日常語だ

translation.en: And what does it say?
"The fallen shall rise in a river of blood."
translation.ja: “悪魔が地上に現れ 大勢が死ぬ”

translation.en: Do you have a moment?
Of course.
Can I get you some tea? Or maybe something more substantial?
translation.ja: 紅茶にする？ お酒のほうがいい？

translation.en: Yes, that would be very nice.
You dabble in the occult?
I found them here when I arrived.
I wanted to ask you, did you treat Bession?
translation.ja: ベシオンに治療をした？

translation.en: You should let me clean that before it gets infected.
translation.ja: 先に消毒しときましょ

translation.en: There was nothing I could do for Monsieur Bession.
He had no medical symptoms.
Nothing to suggest any kind of disease or infection.
translation.ja: 感染症とかの病気の兆候はね

translation.en: His breakdown was purely mental. And extremely severe.
translation.ja: 精神的な病よ　しかも重度の

translation.en: That's why the Turkana fear the church is cursed.
translation.ja: 皆 教会を恐れるわけだ

translation.en: That and the disappearances. In the past few weeks, we've lost a dozen men.
translation.ja: 人も消えてるの 何人も行方不明になってるわ

translation.en: Runaways?
Or is it those evil spirits?
Yeah.
I'm sorry. I shouldn't have...
Your curiosity's perfectly natural.
My father was a strong man.
When the Nazis started rounding up the Jews in our town, he didn't hesitate.
translation.ja: ナチに狙われた ユダヤ人を助けたの

translation.en: He hid our neighbors in the crawl space.
But someone turned us in, and we were all sent to the concentration camps.
translation.ja: でも密告されて 私たちも強制収容所へ

translation.en: I'm sorry.
People can't really understand, can they? If they weren't there.
translation.ja: 入った者でないと 苦痛は分からんだろう

translation.en: If they didn't see.
No.
My husband turned out to be one of those people. I met him after the war,
translation.ja: 夫も収容所にいたの 戦後 出会ったわ

translation.en: and we came to Africa together, in love.
translation.ja: そしてアフリカへ 愛し合ってた

translation.en: One night I realized I-- I had to tell him the truth...
translation.ja: ある晩 夫に ナチにやられたことを⸺

translation.en: ...about the Nazis and what they did to me.
translation.ja: 思い切って打ち明けてみたら

translation.en: After that, he never touched me again.
So...
What turns a man of the cloth into an archeologist?
translation.ja: なぜ神父が考古学者に？

translation.en: I don't know, I suppose I--
translation.ja: どうしてかな　たぶん⸺

translation.en: I wanted to work with something real, something I could touch with my hands.
translation.ja: 実体のない物が むなしくなって

translation.en: Do you miss it? Being a priest?
No. There's no point in that.
translation.ja: 辞めて後悔はしてない

translation.en: Sometimes I think the best view of God is from hell.
translation.ja: 神は地獄から見るべきかも

translation.en: I should get to bed.
I'm going to Nairobi tomorrow, to see Bession.
translation.ja: 明日 ベシオンに会いに行く

translation.en: Talk to Father Gionetti.
Gionetti?
He runs the sanitarium.
Well, thank you... for the medical care.
translation.ja: ありがとう 手の治療をね

translation.en: You, priest, what is your name?
translation.ja: おい 神父　名前は？

translation.en: I'm Father Merrin.
God is not here today, priest.
Want some water?
Hey. What's wrong?
translation.ja: おい　どうしたんだ

translation.en: It's late. You should go back to bed.
translation.ja: もう遅い　寝床へ戻れよ

translation.en: Give it to me! It's mine!
Oh, is it yours? Give it to me!
translation.ja: お前のか？ メリンさんがくれたんだ

translation.en: Mr. Merrin gave it to me.
translation.ja: メリンさんがくれたんだ

translation.en: Here, take it. Take it!
Oh, just give it to me, you idiot!
Who are you calling idiot? Take it, it's right here!
translation.ja: バカだって？　なら取れよ

translation.en: Give it to me! It's mine!
Shorty, shorty!
Just give it to me! All right, okay!
Go back to bed, and I'll give you the stupid thing.
Joseph, look out!
Joseph, get Papa, get Papa!
Joseph, help me!
Joseph, please, get Papa quickly!
JAMES: Help me! Help me!
SARAH: What happened?
Hyenas. They tore James apart.
Did you see that, Lankester? The hyenas ignored Joseph.
translation.ja: 見ただろ ジョセフを襲わなかった

translation.en: They were focused on his brother.
That was a lot more than focused. They acted as if he wasn't even there.
translation.ja: あの場所に弟が いなかったかのようにな

translation.en: Can you see? Can you hear?
translation.ja: 見えるか？　聞こえる？

translation.en: Monsieur Bession?
Mr. Bession. You worked on a dig in Derati.
translation.ja: デラーティで 発掘をしてましたね？

translation.en: You drew a picture of an idol.
translation.ja: 彫像の絵を描いてるが どこで見たんです？

translation.en: Where did you see it? Was it in the church?
translation.ja: 彫像の絵を描いてるが どこで見たんです？ 教会の中で？

translation.en: MERRIN: Monsieur Bession.
Father Merrin. How do you know my name?
translation.ja: メリン神父だな なぜ知ってる

translation.en: I said, how do you know my name?
Are you hurt?
No.
I'm free.
God is not here today, priest.
translation.ja: 今日 神はいないぞ　神父

translation.en: I hope he finds peace.
I'm Father Gionetti. I've been waiting for you.
translation.ja: ジオネッティです 待ってましたよ

translation.en: MERRIN: How did he know my name?
Have you drifted so far from God, Merrin, that you can't see?
translation.ja: 神の教えを忘れたんですか？

translation.en: Monsieur Bession was touched by the devil.
Demonic possession? Forgive me, Father.
translation.ja: 悪魔の乗り移り？　まさか

translation.en: I never said he was possessed. Only touched.
So, touched. What does that mean?
translation.ja: 接した？ どういう意味です？

translation.en: In 1647, the Ursuline Convent in Loudun, France
translation.ja: 1647年 フランスにあった修道院に

translation.en: was plagued by possession.
Thirty-four nuns had been touched by the devil, committing unspeakable acts.
translation.ja: 接した尼僧が みだらな行為をしたんです

translation.en: Having orgies including goats
translation.ja: 獣姦をしても 悪魔のせいじゃなく

translation.en: doesn't make them possessed, simply horny...
translation.ja: 獣姦をしても 悪魔のせいじゃなく 尼僧たちの単なる色欲ですよ

translation.en: and inventive.
translation.ja: 尼僧たちの単なる色欲ですよ

translation.en: Four priests were dispatched to exorcise the demons.
translation.ja: ４人の神父が 悪魔払いに行った

translation.en: Three of them were possessed themselves and subsequently died.
translation.ja: ３人が取り憑(つ)かれて命を失い

translation.en: The last one was driven insane by his brush... with evil.
translation.ja: 接しただけの１人も 正気をなくしたんです

translation.en: That is what happened to Monsieur Bession.
translation.ja: ベシオンさんのように

translation.en: And that evil remains in Derati. You must be careful there.
translation.ja: 悪魔はまだデラーティにいる 気をつけなさい

translation.en: Remember, he is the father of lies.
translation.ja: いいかね？ 悪魔は巧みにウソをつく

translation.en: He will seek to poison your mind. You will need this against him.
translation.ja: 心を支配するためにだ これが必要になるぞ

translation.en: The Roman Rituals.
If you need somebody to perform an exorcism, I'm not your man. I'm not a priest anymore.
translation.ja: 私は悪魔払いなどやらない 神父じゃないぞ

translation.en: You will always be a priest, Father Merrin.
Only your faith can save you.
Well, then, I'm doomed.
Joseph?
What do you have there?
Can I see?
You threw it away.
Jefferies, what the hell are you doing in here?
It was in the dirt outside, you threw it away.
translation.ja: 地面に落ちてた 捨てたんだろ

translation.en: No, I didn't. The clasp must have come loose.
translation.ja: 違うわ　留め金が外れて…

translation.en: Liar!
Do I repulse you that much?
Maybe if you could cure my fucking face,
translation.ja: 顔の出来物さえ消えれば

translation.en: I might look as good to you as that archeologist.
translation.ja: メリンと同じ男前になれる

translation.en: Joseph?
[WHISPERS] He's coming for you.
translation.ja: おじさんの前に現れる

translation.en: What?
[NORMAL VOICE] He's coming for you.
What happened?
I had a bad dream.
Don't worry. You'll be fine.
translation.ja: 安心して　先生が付いてるわ

translation.en: Where is everybody?
Sebituana's baby is coming, so the village has gathered in welcome.
translation.ja: 赤ん坊が産まれるので村へ

translation.en: Joseph.
Joseph.
You're back.
Are you all right?
Yeah, I'm just a little bit tired.
These lesions... they're not from the shock, are they?
translation.ja: 胸の傷は トラウマと無関係だろ？

translation.en: No. They're completely asymptomatic.
translation.ja: ええ　痛みもないようなの

translation.en: It just doesn't make sense. He should have recovered by now.
translation.ja: もう回復していい頃なのに

translation.en: So, what is it?
In this part of the world... it could be a dozen things.
translation.ja: 奥地だから いろいろ考えられる

translation.en: But his symptoms don't really match any of them.
So all I can do is just watch and wait.
I have to do some work up at the dig. Will you be all right?
translation.ja: 発掘現場へ行ってくる １人で大丈夫？

translation.en: Yes.
Come sit with me, Lankester.
I promise I won't bite.
What is it?
How was Nairobi? Oh, fine.
translation.ja: ナイロビは？ いい町だ

translation.en: Did you see Monsieur Bession?
He's dead.
How?
I don't know. Some accident.
translation.ja: 分からん　事故だったようだ

translation.en: I just don't understand.
Everything that's happening here... It seems like I can't help anyone anymore.
translation.ja: 私には もうだれも 救えないみたいだわ

translation.en: Easy.
Help me hold him.
Emekwi. I'm doing everything I can for him.
translation.ja: エメクイ　手は尽くしてるわ

translation.en: Joseph?
It's this place, Lankester. The Turkana are right, it's cursed.
translation.ja: 村人が言うように ここは呪われてるわ

translation.en: Sarah. You don't understand.
translation.ja: サラ 信じてほしい

translation.en: What they did to me in the camp. They--
There's nothing left to bleed.
There is something here, something evil.
Sarah, it's so much easier to believe in evil as an entity, but it's not.
translation.ja: 悪魔の仕業だと決めるのは 結論の急ぎすぎだ

translation.en: It's a purely human condition inside all of us.
translation.ja: 私たちの心の問題だぞ

translation.en: Did Bession talk about what he found under the church?
translation.ja: ベシオンから 教会の地下の話は？

translation.en: There's an ancient temple below, a pagan place,
where they used to conduct sacrifices, human sacrifices.
translation.ja: 人間をいけにえにした 神殿があるぞ

translation.en: Why would they build a church on top of something like that?
translation.ja: なぜ上に教会を建てたの？

translation.en: Perhaps to purify the site.
But then, why bury it?
Merrin!
You better come with me.
Jefferies didn't show up for the dig this morning. He wasn't in his room, so they came to the bar, and they found...
translation.ja: ジェフリースを捜してて 見つけたそうです

translation.en: Chief Sebituana's baby was stillborn last night. He blames the whites.
translation.ja: 妻が死産したことで 族長は白人を恨んでる

translation.en: You think the Turkana took Jefferies?
I think this place is on the verge of an uprising.
translation.ja: 私たちも襲われますよ

translation.en: I've contacted Major Granville. A detachment will be here by this afternoon.
translation.ja: 早く部隊を送るよう 少佐に頼みました

translation.en: You disagree?
In my experience, bringing soldiers into a situation is always a bad idea.
translation.ja: 兵隊が来ると ろくなことがない

translation.en: MERRIN: Who buried them?
Everybody died.
Who buried them?
Major Granville. Hello, Peter.
Any answers on Jefferies? I'm afraid not.
translation.ja: ジェフリースは？ どこにも

translation.en: Well, you did the right thing calling me, Father.
translation.ja: 私を呼んだのは正しい判断だ

translation.en: I've been in these situations before, and you have to stay on top of--
translation.ja: 経験も豊富だし 白人は住民の上に…

translation.en: On top of these people.
I'm not sure the Turkana are responsible for what's happening here, Major.
translation.ja: 村人がやったとは限らない

translation.en: Major Granville?
This dig is too important to jeopardize,
and until I'm satisfied that the excavation is secure,
translation.ja: 現場の安全が確保されるまで

translation.en: the British army will assume complete control.
The Turkana won't like the show of force.
I'm not concerned with what the Turkana like, Mr. Merrin.
translation.ja: 住民の感情など どうでもいい

translation.en: And if they start any more trouble,
they will have to answer to the might of His Majesty King George.
translation.ja: 国王の軍隊の力を見せつける

translation.en: You cannot be here.
Please tell Sebituana I'm sorry for his loss.
You are not welcome here.
I want to know about the plague that destroyed this village 50 years ago.
translation.ja: 50年前の 疫病の話をしてほしい

translation.en: It was not a plague.
So, what was it?
The evil in your church,
it has taken Emekwi's youngest son... and it is getting stronger.
translation.ja: エメクイの子に乗り移り 力を増してる

translation.en: You must abandon your work...
or we'll be forced to stop you.
So you don't want to tell me?
He says he doesn't have to tell you, because it's happening again...
translation.ja: 見てれば分かるそうだ

translation.en: right now.
You don't bury your dead. You cremate them.
translation.ja: 火葬する習(なら)わしか？

translation.en: Yes.
Then who's buried in that graveyard?
translation.ja: じゃ 墓にはだれが？

translation.en: I'm sorry.
I'm sorry.
Daddy.
I will shoot 10, priest...
and you will choose.
I can't do that.
Now you choose... or I will kill them all.
translation.ja: 早く選べ さもないと全員 殺す

translation.en: Are you praying?
To God?
Shoot me.
God is not here today, priest.
[CRYING] Papa.
They're empty. What?
I dug up three graves. They were all empty. What happened here?
translation.ja: 空だったぞ　なぜだ

translation.en: I don't know. Oh, yes, you do.
translation.ja: 見当も 正直に言え だましてたんだろ

translation.en: You've been lying to me since we got here.
translation.ja: 正直に言え だましてたんだろ

translation.en: Let go of me. Damn it!
translation.ja: 放して 墓に十字架を立て 柩(ひつぎ)にも十字架があった

translation.en: There are crosses on the graves. There are crosses on the coffins.
translation.ja: 墓に十字架を立て 柩(ひつぎ)にも十字架があった

translation.en: The church buried them, didn't they? Didn't they?
translation.ja: 教会が埋めさせたな？ そうだろ

translation.en: Yes.
Why? What were they hiding?
translation.ja: どうしてだ　何を隠してる

translation.en: That this place is damned. [SCOFFS]
No! You asked the question! Now you're gonna listen to the answer!
translation.ja: 質問したなら最後まで聞け

translation.en: There was a massacre here... 1500 years ago.
translation.ja: 大量殺戮(さつりく)が起きた 1500年前の話だ

translation.en: An army from the West, led by two priests,
translation.ja: ２人の神父が率いる 西方の軍隊が

translation.en: searching for the origin of a powerful evil.
translation.ja: 悪霊の起源を捜してた

translation.en: But when they got here, that evil consumed them,
translation.ja: でもここで取り憑かれ

translation.en: turning the soldiers against each other in a bloodbath.
translation.ja: 兵が互いに殺し合ったんだ

translation.en: Only a single priest survived. When that priest made it back to the Emperor Justinian,
translation.ja: １人生き残った神父が 祖国の皇帝に伝えると⸺

translation.en: he ordered that a church be built over the site and then buried to seal the evil inside.
translation.ja: “そこに教会を建てて埋め 悪魔を封じ込めろ”

translation.en: All mention of it was to be stricken from the history texts forever.
But it wasn't.
No.
a Vatican researcher found an ancient letter in the archives.
translation.ja: 教皇庁で古い手紙が見つかり

translation.en: Four priests came to examine the site, enlisting the help of the people of this valley in their search,
translation.ja: 神父がここを調べに来て 住民に協力を頼んだ

translation.en: and they all disappeared.
Where did they go?
No one knows.
The Vatican ordered a cover-up... the false graveyard.
translation.ja: 教皇庁は隠し通そうと 墓地を造らせて

translation.en: The tale of a plague to.... To scare people away.
translation.ja: 人を寄せ付けないよう 疫病のウワサを流した

translation.en: And then the British stumbled across it.
And I was sent here to see if the legend was real.
translation.ja: 私の使命は伝説の調査だ

translation.en: What legend?
That after the war in heaven... this is the spot where Lucifer fell.
translation.ja: “ルシファーは天を追われて この地へ”という

translation.en: God brought you here, Lankester.
Leave me alone.
No.
No.
The devil is here... inside that boy. The Turkana know it.
translation.ja: 悪魔はあの少年の中にいる 村人たちは承知だ

translation.en: They came to drive the devil from him, and he almost killed them.
translation.ja: だから少年を殺しに来た

translation.en: You can't run from this. You must help me.
translation.ja: ここから逃げられないぞ 私に力を貸せ

translation.en: I can't.
But you've seen what's going on here. You have to believe.
translation.ja: 状況は分かってるはずだ 神の導きを信じろ

translation.en: I believe in nothing.
They've found Jefferies.
Major Granville. Wait.
translation.ja: グランビル少佐　待って

translation.en: Get him down.
Get him down!
You all right, Major?
Savages.
Major.
Major!
Bloody savages.
JOMO: Why are you here?
Granville!
JOMO: You have no business to be here!
JOMO: You must leave. Granville!
JOMO: You people have plundered our ancestors.
You must return Turkana to us now. MERRIN: Let me through!
JOMO: It's time to go. You have already polluted our lives.
translation.ja: 祖国へ帰れ　お前らは害悪だ

translation.en: You came here with your evil. We knew peace before you came.
translation.ja: 悪魔を連れてきた 平和だったのに

translation.en: MERRIN: Granville!
CHUMA: They think it's inside Joseph. They believe the evil is upon us.
translation.ja: 悪魔はジョセフの中だと 思ってる

translation.en: Chuma!
Merrin?
They believe it is inside Joseph. They're going to kill him.
translation.ja: 悪魔は少年の中だと信じて 殺す気だ

translation.en: Now, please... go.
translation.ja: 早く戻って　今すぐに

translation.en: Sir, the Turkana are preparing to attack.
translation.ja: 部族が攻撃を準備中です

translation.en: Leave me.
Sir?
I said, leave me.
Yes, sir.
We must leave now. Why?
translation.ja: ここを出ろ なぜだ

translation.en: Where's Sarah? I don't know.
Take the boy to Nairobi. Father Gionetti.
translation.ja: この子をナイロビの病院へ

translation.en: FRANCIS: Why?
Turkana are coming to kill him.
It's a sandstorm.
It won't let us leave.
We have to hide him.
The church. No.
The Turkana won't go in there. It's his only chance.
translation.ja: 村の者は入ってこないぞ

translation.en: Aren't you coming? I have to find Sarah.
translation.ja: 乗って サラを捜してから行く

translation.en: We'll meet you.
translation.ja: サラを捜してから行く

translation.en: Francis.
Now go.
Sarah?
[WHISPERS] The Lord is coming for you.
Sarah?
Sarah?
Sarah? [KNOCKING]
Sarah!
Oh, my God.
Bession was Sarah's husband?
Yes.
She went into the church with him, didn't she?
It's not Joseph. It's Sarah.
translation.ja: 悪魔はサラに 乗り移ってたんだ

translation.en: Ready yourselves, men!
MAN: Fire!
Chuma.
Francis?
Francis?
Francis.
O, Lord, forgive my disbelief.
translation.ja: 主よ 疑念をお許し下さい お力が必要です

translation.en: I need you.
translation.ja: 疑念をお許し下さい お力が必要です

translation.en: These people need you. This valley needs you.
translation.ja: 皆が必要としています

translation.en: Hear my cry. Do not abandon me now.
translation.ja: 祈りを聞き 見捨てないで下さい

translation.en: Forgive my sins.
Joseph.
[DEMONIC VOICE] Come sit with us, Lankester.
I promise I won't bite.
Joseph, run.
translation.ja: ジョセフ　走るんだ

translation.en: He's mine.
Run.
Leave him alone. It's me you want.
translation.ja: やめろ　狙いは私だろ

translation.en: I am a fallen priest.
Lord, have mercy on us. Christ, have mercy on us. Lord, have mercy on us.
translation.ja: 主よ 慈悲を我らに キリストよ 情けを我らに

translation.en: God, Father in heaven, have mercy on us.
translation.ja: 父なる神よ 哀れみを我らに

translation.en: God, the Son, redeemer of the world, have mercy on us.
translation.ja: 父と子と聖霊よ 慈悲を我らに

translation.en: God, the Holy Spirit, have mercy on us. Christ, hear us.
translation.ja: 父と聖霊よ 情けを我らに キリストよ 力を

translation.en: Holy Mary, pray for us. Christ, hear us.
translation.ja: 聖母よ お祈り下さい キリストよ 力を

translation.en: Lord, have mercy on us.
What's the matter, Merrin? Don't you wanna fuck me anymore?
translation.ja: 何なのよ あたしと したくないの？

translation.en: All ye holy angels and archangels, pray for us!
translation.ja: すべての大天使よ お祈り下さい

translation.en: All ye holy orders of blessed spirits, [LAUGHS] pray for us!
translation.ja: すべての聖人よ お祈り下さい

translation.en: Why would he listen to you? You.
translation.ja: 神は聞いちゃいないよ

translation.en: You believe in nothing.
You're all alone. Without hope.
translation.ja: 孤立無援で 希望もなしだ

translation.en: Almighty Lord and father of Jesus Christ...
translation.ja: 全能の神よ キリストの父よ この私をしもべに

translation.en: grant me, your unworthy servant, pardon for my sins...
translation.ja: キリストの父よ この私をしもべに 罪を許し⸺

translation.en: and the power to fight this cruel--
Joseph, come on.
Don't be afraid. No! Father!
MERRIN: Joseph. JOSEPH: Father Merrin....
Joseph!
Oh, Lord...
by your name, save me.
By your strength, defend my cause.
Joseph.
Joseph.
Joseph, wait.
Joseph. JOSEPH [ECHOING]: Father.
I'm coming.
O, God, hear my prayer.
translation.ja: 神よ 祈りをお聞き下さい

translation.en: The ruthless seek my life. They do not keep God before them.
translation.ja: 悪魔が私を 殺そうとしています

translation.en: Turn back the evil upon my foes.
In your faithfulness, destroy them.
translation.ja: そして滅ぼして下さい

translation.en: Where is your God now, Merrin?
Fucking his only son while you call out his name?
He doesn't care about this whore. But you do...
translation.ja: 売女(ばいた)のサラが好みの女だろ

translation.en: because you want to shove your rotten cock up her juicy ass.
translation.ja: ケツに 突っ込みたいと思ってる

translation.en: You can't have her, priest. The whore is mine.
And I'll kill her before I let you take her from me.
translation.ja: 楽しんでから殺してやる

translation.en: For the soul's made to the image and likeness of God...
translation.ja: 神の姿そっくりに作られた 人間の力で⸺

translation.en: I cast you out!
You're a killer, Merrin. You looked them in the eye, pointed, and they died.
translation.ja: 人殺しだろ お前が選んで死なせた

translation.en: [GERMAN OFFICER'S VOICE] God is not here today, priest.
translation.ja: 今日 神はいないぞ クソ神父

translation.en: Oh, yes, he is.
You're going to watch him die, Merrin Fail him like you failed all the others.
translation.ja: 死ぬとこを見な お前は皆を死なせた

translation.en: God, spare this child, for he is innocent...
translation.ja: 神よ 罪なき子供を お守り下さい

translation.en: and deserves your blessing. God, spare this child...
translation.ja: そして祝福を 神よ 罪なき子供を どうかお守り下さい

translation.en: for he is innocent and deserves your blessing.
translation.ja: 神よ 罪なき子供を どうかお守り下さい そして祝福を

translation.en: God, spare this child, for he is innocent and deserves your blessing.
translation.ja: 神よ 罪なきこの子を お守り下さい

translation.en: I command you to depart! It's the power of Christ that compels you!
translation.ja: 神の名において お前は追放だ

translation.en: It is God himself who commands you. It is the majestic Christ who commands you.
translation.ja: この命令は キリストの命令だぞ

translation.en: God, the Father, commands you. God, the Son, commands you. God, the Holy Spirit commands you.
translation.ja: 父と子と聖霊が 発した命令なんだ

translation.en: The mystery of the cross commands you. Unclean spirit, I cast you out!
translation.ja: 聖なる十字架も命じた 悪魔め うせろ！

translation.en: [NORMAL VOICE] Lankester.
Sarah, Sarah.
It's over now.
Joseph, Joseph.
translation.ja: ジョセフ ジョセフ

translation.en: Father.
Don't be afraid. I need your help, Joseph.
Listen, whatever you hear,
translation.ja: いいか？ 悪魔が言うことはウソだ 耳を貸すな

translation.en: whatever you see, it's just his lies.
translation.ja: 悪魔が言うことはウソだ 耳を貸すな

translation.en: Don't listen. Don't watch. You understand?
translation.ja: 悪魔が言うことはウソだ 耳を貸すな 見てもダメだぞ

translation.en: Don't listen!
It's just lies.
translation.ja: 全部 ウソだ 心を強く持ち⸺

translation.en: You have to be strong and concentrate.
translation.ja: 全部 ウソだ 心を強く持ち⸺ 集中しろ

translation.en: Can you read this?
I will start there. Then you will answer.
translation.ja: ここから祈る　君が次を読め

translation.en: That's me. That's you. That's me, and that's you. You understand?
translation.ja: ２人で交互に祈る　いいな？

translation.en: Good.
Let's start.
O, God, by your name, save me.
translation.ja: 神よ あなたの名において お救い下さい

translation.en: "Amen."
Save your servant.
JOSEPH: "Who places his trust in thee, my God."
translation.ja: “あなたを信じている しもべです”

translation.en: Be unto her, O, Lord, a fortified tower.
translation.ja: 大事な人をお守り下さい

translation.en: JOSEPH: "In the face of the enemy."
O, Lord, hear my prayer.
"And let my cry come unto thee."
The Lord be with you.
"And also with you."
Be gone, evil spirit...
In the name of the Father and of the Son...
and of the Holy Ghost.
By the sign of this Holy Cross...
by our Lord Jesus Christ...
God, the Holy Ghost, commands you!
The blood of the martyrs commands you!
translation.ja: 殉教者たちの力で追放だ！

translation.en: In God's name, demon!
translation.ja: 神の名において 悪魔め

translation.en: I cast you out!
Sarah.
Sarah.
Okay?
[NORMAL VOICE] Thank you.
Sarah. What is it?
What is it, Sarah?
Help. Help!
translation.ja: 助けて　ランカスター

translation.en: Lankester. No.
translation.ja: 助けて　ランカスター しっかり

translation.en: Help.
No. Help.
Sarah.
[WHISPERS] Father.
She's with God now.
She's with God.
I trust your mission was successful.
I couldn't find what you were looking for.
But you found something. Didn't you?
translation.ja: だが再び信仰を 見つけたようだな

translation.en: Goodbye, Mr. Semelier.
Au revoir , Mr. Merrin.
translation.ja: 元気で　メリンさん

translation.en: It's Father Merrin.
